project_descr: Initiation of Project "Network of Managed Resource Protected Areas"

outputs.output_descr: In this short term project assessments will be carried out to establish a baseline and develop a project document through a wide consultation. The project will support expansion of the protected area system, improve the policy on community based natural resource management and add a new category of protected areas for sustainable use to Mongolia's Protected Area System.

project_title: initiation of project "managed resource protected areas"
